```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)

urlfile = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/hate-crimes/hate_crimes.csv"
hate_crime = read_csv(url(urlfile)) %>%
  drop_na(hate_crimes_per_100k_splc) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(ln_hate_crimes_rate = log(hate_crimes_per_100k_splc))

skim(hate_crime)

mult.fit <- lm(ln_hate_crimes_rate ~ ., data = hate_crime)
step(mult.fit, direction = 'backward')

summary(lm(ln_hate_crimes_rate ~ . - state - avg_hatecrimes_per_100k_fbi - hate_crimes_per_100k_splc, data = hate_crime))
```
